about: I am Masters of Computer Applications student currently studying in VIT, Vellore. I have a passion of development and testing. I have strong fundamentals in Computer Networks with good academic track records. I have worked on a few projects in MERN, JSP, Servlets and have a knowledge of both SQL and NoSQL databases. I have basic understanding and uses of AWS Cloud Deployment and Storage. I have qualified multiple competitive exams like GATE CSE and CUET PG.
